past.title: ELECTRO ESSENTIALS 2.0
past.info: This event was second edition of Electro Essential. Participants enjoyed hands on experience on Basic Electronic Components and Arduino UNO with some Mini Projects.

past.title: Alumni Interaction With Students
past.info: This event was organized to explain all about Data Science And AIML and various other courses needed to get good job placements.

past.title: Workshop On Proteus Software
past.info: This workshop is to provide knowledge regarding Proteus Software and covers every part regarding Printed Circuit Board.

past.title: Rocket Boys Stream Party
past.info: Electro Infinity Club presents live streaming of web series based on life of Dr. Homi Jehangir Bhabha and Dr. Vikram Ambalal Sarabhai, who created history while building India's future.

past.title: Introduction to PCB Designing
past.info: This workshop will cover the basics of PCB design, its terminologies, basics to schematic, footprint creation, placement & route and various other topics.

past.title: Internet of Things and it's Applications
past.info: This workshop will help you to learn and explore the internet of things, so don't miss this opportunity.

past.title: Electronics Essential
past.info:
Students were given a practical hands-on session about basic components, breadboards, Arduino and connections and much more ðŸ’».
Note: This was an offline event.

past.title: EIC Quiz Series
past.info: Online Quiz on questions related to basic electronics. Quiz took place for 6 days where students attempted over 30 questions

past.title: Induction Program
past.info: This Induction program was about brief information about the club and registration for new members.
